subject: Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: Kevin VanDam reeled in a catch of 18 pounds 12 ounces yesterday to retake the lead and capture the Bassmaster Elite Series’ Sooner Run on Grand Lake in Grove, Okla.VanDam’s four-day total weighed 78 pounds 2 ounces, and his $100,000 payday brought his career earnings to nearly $2.5 million.VanDam, a 12-time BASS tournament winner, is the career- leading money winner.
